Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

I am new to this forum and to Kerbal Space Program in general. I found it about a week ago.

For several weeks now, I\'ve been thinking: 'Hey, wouldn\'t it be great if there was a space travel sandbox game? Which lets you build your own rockets and all?' However, I never really looked into it, not expecting such a thing to really exist. 

Then I found a video of KSP on Google+ and...well, long story short, I think those were the best spent 15$ ever ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I\'m using a few mods and consider myself a more or less 'realistic player', launching probes to the moon first, testing my gear in low orbit etc.

What else about me...

- English is not my native tongue, so I hope you can forgive me the occasional spelling and grammar mistake.

- I\'m a huge fan of 'MLP:FiM'. Just throwing this out there because I\'ve seen a few pony-avatars and -signatures around here ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

- If you want to know *anything* else about me, go ahead and ask me. I won\'t promise to answer every question, but you can always ask ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

So yea...thanks for having me here.

Syrus out~

> 
> - English is not my native tongue, so I hope you can forgive me the occasional spelling and grammar mistake.

Your spelling is top notch, english isn\'t my native either, but i think it owes more to the laziness of those who actually do have it as the first, welcome aboard!

> 
> - I\'m a huge fan of 'MLP:FiM'. Just throwing this out there because I\'ve seen a few pony-avatars and -signatures around here ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Pretty much any preference is alright here, but do note, it\'s probably best if you keep as an introverted brony, i am a brony myself as well, the difference is that i pretty much never do anything in relation to MLP outside where it belongs, do like me, and you\'ll be just fine.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
